title: SOLD: 1910 Great Bend Millers postcard, Kansas State League
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1910 Great Bend Millers postcard, Kansas State League
posts.post_content:
For sale: RPPC of the 1910 Great Bend Millers of the Kansas State League.

The photo shows exceptional clarity and is somewhat unique with the "floating heads" depiction.

Photo matched to the 1910 squad.  The roster contained 4 players who would play in MLB.

$SOLD postpaid in the continental U.S.

[url]http://www.baseball-reference.com/register/team.cgi?id=640a82ff[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

A commitment to purchase surpasses any ongoing negotiations.  :eek:
